model.unit

Class Inventory

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.unit.Inventory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Observer

    public class Inventory
extends java.lang.Object
implements Observer
    Defines an object for containing and manipulating items.
    Author:
    Jonathan Trudeau
